item.title: Create VPC Stack
item.description: This step will create the VPC and all components using the example CloudFormation template. Download the latest version of the CloudFormation template here: vpc-alb-app-db.yaml Go to the AWS CloudFormation console at https://console.aws.amazon.com/cloudformation and click Create Stack > With new resources Leave Prepare template setting as-is For Template source select Upload a template file Click Choose file and supply the CloudFormation template you downloaded: vpc-alb-app-db.yaml Click Next For Stack name use WebApp1-VPC

item.title: Tear Down
item.description: The following instructions will remove the resources that you have created in this lab. Note: If you are planning on completing the lab 200_Automated_Deployment_of_EC2_Web_Application we recommend you only tear down this lab after completing both, as there is a dependency on this VPC. Delete the VPC CloudFormation stack: Sign in to the AWS Management Console, select your preferred region, and open the CloudFormation console at https://console.aws.amazon.com/cloudformation/ . Click the radio button on the left of the WebApp1-VPC stack.
